name: Dungeon Dice
description:
DUNGEON DICE

Dungeon Dice was developed for GBJAM 7.  Dungeon Dice was developed by one person over the course of two days for the jam.  The controls in Dungeon Dice are as follows:

UP - MOVE  UP

DOWN - MOVE DOWN

LEFT - MOVE LEFT

RIGHT - MOVE RIGHT

ENTER - START

TAB - CHANGE COLOR PALETTE

The goal of Dungeon Dice is to see how long you can last, you will have to use strategy in order to survive for a lengthy period of time.

PLEASE FEEL FREE TO COMMENT BELOW
